generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road surface with visible lane markings and curbs, typical of a street used for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: There are clearly defined pedestrian walkways on both sides of the road, separated by curbs and bordered by vegetation and buildings.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings with windows and architectural features are visible along the street and in the background.
- vegetation: Trees with leaves are present along the sidewalk and in the background, indicating the presence of vegetation.
- person: Two individuals are visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- traffic light: A red traffic light is visible at an intersection in the distance.
- traffic sign: Several traffic signs are visible, including a yellow sign on a pole on the right and a white sign with a black symbol on a pole near the tram stop.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- bus: A white tram (a type of bus for public transport) is visible on the left side of the image, traveling along the tracks.
- train: The tram on the left side of the image is a train on rails, as it is designed for public transport and runs on tracks.
- motorcycle: No motorcycle is visible in the image.
- bicycle: No bicycle is visible in the image.
- car: A few cars are visible parked or driving in the distance on the right side of the image.
- truck: No truck is visible in the image.
- terrain: A small patch of grass is visible on the right side of the image, near the sidewalk.
- sky: The sky is not visible in the image due to the presence of buildings and trees.
